post.author: MyungDae Kim
post.content:
I believe most members have high knowledge in JAVA.
For beginners or short experienced person, I would introduce WEB site of two part time classes in Seneca College.
One is OOP course based on JAVA. The other is JAVA I course.
OOP http://www3.sympatico.ca/blackw/ JAVA I http://people.senecac.on.ca/newman.seto/
It could be helpful to understand the level or direction of part time class in College. If you want to learn any technical skills, I would recommend attending part time classes.
post.title: Part Time Class Web site for beginners
